member.name: M:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Source.Hls.DefaultHlsExtractorFactory.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.param: Flags to add when constructing any DefaultTsPayloadReaderFactory instances. Other flags may be added on top of payloadReaderFactoryFlags when creating DefaultTsPayloadReaderFactory.

Whether created TsExtractor instances should expose a CEA-608 track should the multivariant playlist contain no Closed Captions declarations. If the multivariant playlist contains any Closed Captions declarations, this flag is ignored.
